    background-color: #E8F5FD;
  }

</style>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" aria-hidden="true" data-tweet-stat-count="0">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForAria" id="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-979345048209952769">0 retweets</span>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--favorite u-hiddenVisually">
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="1">

    </span>
  </div>

Remarkable progress so far on <a href="/SunderlandUK" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20132540"><s>@</s><b>SunderlandUK</b></a>s 3,6,9 Vision  Northern Spire, Music Arts and Culture Quarter, Port of Sunderland, Vaux, <a href="/sunderlanduni" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="119669630"><s>@</s><b>sunderlanduni</b></a>, <a href="/sunderlandcol" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19584750"><s>@</s><b>sunderlandcol</b></a> - major investments <a href="/hashtag/WelcometoSunderland?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WelcometoSunderland</b></a><a href="https://t.co/FFXE3lSf9f" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bqlive.co.uk/north-east-cumbria/2018/03/26/news/billion-pound-boost-for-sunderland-31399/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bqlive.co.uk/north-east-cumbria/2018/03/26/news/billion-pound-boost-for-sunderland-31399/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bqlive.co.uk/north-east-cum</span><span class="invisible">bria/2018/03/26/news/billion-pound-boost-for-sunderland-31399/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Sunderland Conservatives are the only council group to put forward a budget limiting council tax rise to 3% at tomorrow's budget meeting. Labour and Liberal Democrat proposing a 5% increase.</p>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">5</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At last night's full council it was revealed that the two <a href="/WearsideLibDem" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2228036994"><s>@</s><b>WearsideLibDem</b></a> councillors-who campaign against special responsibility allowances-are taking 100% of them for themselves.</p>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Unemployment in the North East fell by 7,000 to 68,000 between September and November. The rate of 5.2% is lower than the West Midlands (5.5%) and on a par with London.</p>
</div>

Inequality is lower than it was in 2010 and the poorest fifth of households have more disposable income than in 2008.<a href="https://t.co/G1gtBb1mKR" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/G1gtBb1mKR</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="951579340210429953" data-item-id="951579340210429953" data-permalink-path="/robert_g_oliver/status/951579340210429953" data-conversation-id="951579340210429953" data-tweet-nonce="951579340210429953-c25f93b8-8bae-4dc3-83c1-23628c6bbef0" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="robert_g_oliver" data-name="Robert Oliver" data-user-id="416356558" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;416356558&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;robert_g_oliver&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Labour councillor proposing a cut to funding for her own local NHS hospital:<a href="https://t.co/cnbOYYddIz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/cllrdianne/status/946404625921474560" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/cllrdianne/status/946404625921474560"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/cllrdianne/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/946404625921474560</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Robert Oliver added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">While NHS trusts in England, including ours in Sunderland,  continue to charge patients, visitors and staff for parking, hospital parking in Scotland and Wales remains largely free, In my opinion it should be free for all.

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Robert Oliver Retweeted The Chronicle</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Yet more evidence that Sunderland trails behind Newcastle in standing up against environmental crime.<a href="https://t.co/psJgzQGiH4" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/ChronicleLive/status/944583388542799872" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/ChronicleLive/status/944583388542799872"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/ChronicleLive/</span><span class="invisible">status/944583388542799872</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Robert Oliver added,</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Threats of violence and intimidation are unacceptable and have no place in our politics. Everybody should be treated with tolerance, decency and respect.</p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="940306277892313088" data-item-id="940306277892313088" data-permalink-path="/robert_g_oliver/status/940306277892313088" data-conversation-id="940306277892313088" data-tweet-nonce="940306277892313088-839f564d-daa3-4032-b41c-a947af5f97c0" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="robert_g_oliver" data-name="Robert Oliver" data-user-id="416356558" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;416356558&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;robert_g_oliver&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/robert_g_oliver" data-user-id="416356558">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Conservative councillors in Sunderland will be moving a motion to bring in a private company to issue litter fines and clean up the city.</p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Robert Oliver Retweeted Conservatives</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The true consequence of welfare reform:<a href="https://t.co/XhEklCJPKE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/903533475025825792" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Conservatives/status/903533475025825792"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Conservatives/</span><span class="invisible">status/903533475025825792</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Robert Oliver added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">It's a fact. And chief constable asked why "there appears to be a predominance of this type of offending in a particular community."<a href="https://t.co/FVv1OcCmyr" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Singh_Srai/status/895354213550759936" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Singh_Srai/status/895354213550759936"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Singh_Srai/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/895354213550759936</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Some tough questions for me at the <a href="/StandUpMag_" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="827141120689860608"><s>@</s><b>StandUpMag_</b></a>  debate but I'm pleased I turned up to put the Conservative view. Thanks for organising.</p>
</div>

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So the Cameron/IDS reforms left Britain with employment higher and inequality lower than any point in the Blair/Brown years. Quite a legacy.</p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A benefits cap of 20,000 per household is equivalent to a salary of 25,000 which is above the average wage in Sunderland. Fair, surely?</p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/SunderlandEcho" data-user-id="15324060">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Robert Oliver Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Subsequent silence on the shambles: <a href="/grahamemorris" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="58821256"><s>@</s><b>grahamemorris</b></a><a href="https://t.co/DWmErr5X7L" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/309065744954580992" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/309065744954580992"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/309065744954580992</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Robert Oliver added,</p>

      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The claimant count in Sunderland is now less than half what it was in 2010. July 2010: 9,347, February 2016: 4,616.</p>
</div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-action--favorite u-hiddenVisually">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Good to see <a href="/jameswhartonuk" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="160856730"><s>@</s><b>jameswhartonuk</b></a> posters up in areas where party has not been traditionally strong. With hard work people can be persuaded.</p>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </button>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">By lifting the North East up, not running the South down, we can close the divide:<a href="http://t.co/fVb1ktpX3e" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/generalelection/north-east-england-enjoyed-biggest-rise-in-living-standards-since-start-of-the-recession-study-finds-10163268.html" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/generalelection/north-east-england-enjoyed-biggest-rise-in-living-standards-since-start-of-the-recession-study-finds-10163268.html"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">independent.co.uk/news/uk/politi</span><span class="invisible">cs/generalelection/north-east-england-enjoyed-biggest-rise-in-living-standards-since-start-of-the-recession-study-finds-10163268.html</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="575195209270755328" data-item-id="575195209270755328" data-permalink-path="/shieldsgazette/status/575195209270755328" data-conversation-id="575195209270755328" data-tweet-nonce="575195209270755328-f500a562-84fb-446c-80bf-264edfa0fd58" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="575222557642784768" data-retweeter="robert_g_oliver" data-screen-name="shieldsgazette" data-name="Shields Gazette" data-user-id="15318121" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;15318121&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;shieldsgazette&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Shields Gazette&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Shields Gazette&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Shields Gazette&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;416356558&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;robert_g_oliver&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Robert Oliver&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="1">

      </span>
    </span>
  </div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">
    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

    </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/robert_g_oliver" data-user-id="416356558">

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">North East has fewer councils sharing services than rest of the country. Savings could be made. Try ICT, procurement or school improvement.</p>
</div>

    Spread the word
  </h3>
  <p class="UIWalkthrough-message">
    The fastest way to share someone elses Tweet with your followers is with a Retweet. Tap the icon to send it instantly.
  </p>
</div>

  </p>
